EmailTemplate.subject: Good news! BlueWave Solar loans now available in Rhode Island
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
New Ocean State offerings!
{!User.FirstName}, Did you know that Rhode Island is one of the top 3 states to go solar in the US?
On August 15th BlueWave Solar will launch its loan products in Rhode Island, providing a simple loan solution to help your customers sign up for solar with confidence.
BlueWave Solar Loan Features:
No money down: 0 payments during installation period Interest only payments for the entire first year No penalties for early repayment Online bill-pay with optional automated payments High quality, personal BlueWave Customer Care
Who is BlueWave Solar?
We focus on bringing local, low-cost solar to communities. That’s our vision for a cleaner planet. And it’s our energy solution for the 100 percent.
BlueWave Solar is committed to our founding principles: preserving the environment, honesty and transparency in everything we do; and respecting and supporting our employees, partners and customers.
Interested? Contact Wells whowe@bluewavesolar.com 1.781.771.9820 Or check out bluewavesolar.com/home-solar-loan-rhode-island/
We hope you join us to make 'Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality.
- Your BlueWave Partner Support Team
